replies.body: I missed out on a ticket. Could I (by any chance) still get the free skin code if I came down to Luna Park on the day?
We will have a skin code for people who are attending the free park activities, but you will have to do a little work for it ;)
my body is ready
lol{{summoner:1}} take me
You're really cute GeneralCoxy, Can we hold hands at the event?
Errrr sure are you scared of the rollercoasters?
{{champion:103}} still able to get what is in the Luna park showbags if we go to Hoyts, if not what is included in the hoyts showbag? {{summoner:2}}
Hey, no the Hoyts Bag is different but still cool :)
can we still buy showbags even if we dont have a ticket
Hey no sorry its not for sale.

You dare deny Voldemort you filthy Mudblood? You should be thankful he doesn't feed you to Nagini.

*bows to Voldemort*
{{summoner:4}} Is it still at HOYTS Stafford? As i bought tickets for there.... {{summoner:6}}
Yes it is.

Awesome cant wait bought my mate a ticket and myself we have played since Season 1, Be cool but wish i could see the koreans live... so much hope haha the korean teams are amazing hope some good plays from OCE teams like maybe a soon to be Faker lol Thanks General (Salute)
No worries dude hope you have a great time at HOYTS!
What kind skins are in the showbag?
You will have to wait, but it will be a skin.
Nice job!
missed ticket sales.. :(
Come on down and take part in all the free activities!

warhammer 40,000 dark nexus giveaway coz im cool


UQKJU-42LYC-H2UM2-GKWPP-SLHHZ


make acc. here and download then enter beta key
be Quick!{{summoner:4}} {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:12}}

is there anyway to still get a free skin or atleast know if it is legacy or not?
coz i didnt get a ticket btw you guys really needed to pick a larger venue because the tickets sold out so fast like alphones or something.

Hey, yes we agree the capacity was filled very quickly, but we based our expectations on the OPL viewership and our previous events we thought we would be ok. So we have learnt a lot and we will be looking for bigger venues in the future. Come on down for the free activities and watch the matches in the park viewing areas!
no ticket :(
Still come down and take part in all the free activities, then watch the game in one of the viewing areas in the park!
Hi, thats very flattering, but we would rather you guys come down have an awesome time and WE get your signatures!
What does the hoyts show bag have besides the skin code? Will it have a T-Shirt?
Hi, the skin is all we are announcing at the moment.
GeneralCoxy Do you think that the Korean or Worlds will ever show at Hoyts in the future?

Thats an interesting question and its something we are talking to them about as we understand there is a lot of interest in viewing League on the big screen. Stay tuned for more information in the coming months.
is their still alot of tickets left in boardway hoyts?
Hi, yes there is, they have sold roughly 100 so I would get in there pretty fast.
i actually work at luna park, so im gonna enjoy the hell out of the finals as i operate the rides you peeps are gonna on. i am excited :D
That is totally awesome! Thanks!
lol im just here in Perth like  :3 fml  {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}
You can go to the screening party at Caro, although you get a different showbag
Is it possible to buy a show bag without the pass?

No it is not.
> Hey no sorry its not for sale.
> GeneralCoxy
{{champion:103}} {{summoner:31}} {{champion:20}} {{item:2052}} Leave a comment
Considering how fast the tickets sold out, you should have made the venue capacity a bit bigger. So upset we didn't get tickets. {{item:3070}}
Hey, yeah MASSIVE learning for us, your passion for the event took us by surprise but don't worry we have taken it all on board!
Are the hoyts showbags the same as the ones at Luna Park, meaning they have the same skin and t-shirt etc.?
Hoyts bags are different but will include a skin and more.
